description: Cant at a given location on the track.

trackGeometryPos.description: position on the associated track edge

appliedCant.description: Height of the right rail minus the left rail. Right/left with respect to the direction of the track edge. Rollangle=(arcsin(cant/gauge)), gauge is distance between middle of the railheads, e.g. 1500mm for EU-standard gauge '1435mm'
